Configuration.Name: ALMA_NCIP_Borrowing_Client_V3
Configuration.Author: Bill Jones, SUNY Geneseo and Tim Jackson, SUNY SLSS
Configuration.Description: This system level addon allows for ILLiad to communicate with Alma via NCIP protocol.

Setting.name: NCIP_Responder_URL
Setting.Description: Replace "xxx" with your institution's three letter Alma code. If SUNY, replace "xxx" with "suny-zzz", and replace zzz with your institution's three letter Alma code.

Setting.name: ILLiad_field_to_get_external_identifier
Setting.Description: This field will be used as the External Identifier in Alma (the transaction number will be used if this field is empty)

Setting.name: ILLiad_field_to_get_barcode
Setting.Description: This field will be used as the item barcode in Alma (the transaction number will be used if this field is empty)

Setting.name: acceptItem_from_uniqueAgency_value
Setting.Description: Replace "XXX" with your institution's three letter Alma code. If SUNY, replace "XXX" with "SUNY_ZZZ", and replace ZZZ with your institution's three letter Alma code.

Setting.name: ApplicationProfileType
Setting.Description: Input the Resource Sharing Partner code used in Alma.

Setting.name: BorrowingAcceptItemFailQueue
Setting.Description: This designates the name of the queue a Borrowing Transaction will be moved to if the BorrowingAcceptItem function fails.

Setting.name: BorrowingCheckInItemFailQueue
Setting.Description: This designates the name of the queue a Borrowing Transaction will be moved to if the BorrowingCheckInItem function fails.

Setting.name: EnablePatronBorrowingReturns
Setting.Description: When this setting is enabled, patron returns will go through ILLiad and a message is sent to Alma. When this setting is disabled, patron returns will update ILLiad and exteral ILL systems like Worldshare but item will need to also be returned in Alma.

Setting.name: Use_Prefixes
Setting.Description: Determines whether or not you want to change prefixes of a transaction based on specific criteria (below). NOTE: Using these will disable the abilty to scan a barcode in Alma.

Setting.name: Prefix_for_LibraryUseOnly
Setting.Description: This setting allows you to change the prefix of a transaction that is marked LibraryUseOnly Yes.

Setting.name: Prefix_for_RenewablesAllowed
Setting.Description: This setting allows you to change the prefix of a transaction that is marked RenewalsAllowed Yes.

Setting.name: Prefix_for_LibraryUseOnly_and_RenewablesAllowed
Setting.Description: This setting allows you to change the prefix of a transaction that is marked both LibraryUseOnly and RenewalsAllowed Yes.
